faqs.question: What is the name of this product?
faqs.answer: The name of this product is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.

faqs.question: What is the vitamin C concentration in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum has a vitamin C concentration of 10%.

faqs.question: What are the key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum are Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

faqs.question: Which skin types is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for?
faqs.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is suitable for Oily and Combination skin types.

faqs.question: What are the main benefits of using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The main benefits of using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum include Brightening and fading dark spots.

faqs.question: Does the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum help with brightening the skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, brightening is one of the benefits of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.

faqs.question: Can this serum fade dark spots?
faqs.answer: Yes, the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to fade dark spots.

faqs.question: How should I use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Apply 2-3 drops of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning before sunscreen.

faqs.question: When is the best time to apply the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The best time to apply the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is in the morning.

faqs.question: How many drops of the serum should be applied?
faqs.answer: You should apply 2-3 drops of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.

faqs.question: Should I apply sunscreen after using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is recommended to apply sunscreen after the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, as the instructions state to apply it before sunscreen.

faqs.question: Are there any known side effects of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: Yes, a known side effect is mild tingling for sensitive skin.

faqs.question: What kind of reaction might sensitive skin experience when using this serum?
faqs.answer: Sensitive skin might experience mild tingling when using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.

faqs.question: What is the price of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The price of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is INR 699.

faqs.question: Does the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contain Hyaluronic Acid?
faqs.answer: Yes, Hyaluronic Acid is one of the key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.

faqs.question: Is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum good for oily skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is suitable for oily skin.

faqs.question: Is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for combination skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is suitable for combination skin.
